edu.uw.zookeeper.net
Interface Connection<I>

All Superinterfaces:
Eventful, Executor, Publisher
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChannelCodecConnection, ChannelConnection, ForwardingConnection, IntraVmConnection, PingingClient, ProtocolCodecConnection
public interface Connection<I>
extends Publisher, Executor

Asynchronous communication channel. Posts at least the following events:

  • Connection.State when the Connection.State changes
  • O when an O is received
Currently there is only one implementation that is based on Netty 4.0.

See Also:
edu.uw.zookeeper.netty
